data.title: EPIL Definition
data.meta_description: Define EPIL. means Elan Pharma International Limited, a private limited company incorporated under the laws of Ireland.
data.text:
As per the adopted Argyll and Bute Local Plan 2009 the site is designated as ‘sensitive countryside’.

In case the Bidder withdraws his Tender during the validity period or in case he changes his offer to his benefits, which are not acceptable to EPI he/she will be debar from future participation in EPIL tender.

BIDDER’S GUIDE FOR EPIL PORTAL: 2.1 Use browser to go to https://www.mstcecommerce.com/eprochome/EPIL Digital Signatures To login into the portal both Users (EPIL Officials) and Bidders will require a Class 2 or 3 Digital Signature.

Use browser to go to https://www.mstcecommerce.com/eprochome/EPIL Digital SignaturesTo login into the portal both Users (EPIL Officials) and Bidders will require a Class 2 or 3 Digital Signature.

Further in case of any increase in rate of taxes in future or the project losing exemption status prior to last date of bid submission or afterwards, the said increase of taxes shall be paid / reimbursed to the Bidder , subject to the conditions that the client reimburses the said increased taxes to EPIL.
